name: electron-app
description: Link Band SDK - Next-generation ultra-lightweight EEG headband SDK
author: Looxid Labs

scripts.electron:dev: tsc -p electron && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.preload.json && concurrently "vite" "wait-on http://dev.linkcloud.co && cross-env ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=true electron . --no-sandbox"
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && tsc -p electron && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.preload.json && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && tsc -p electron && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.preload.json && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && tsc -p electron && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.preload.json && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && tsc -p electron && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.preload.json && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux
scripts.electron:build:publish: npm run build && tsc -p electron && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.preload.json && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --publish=always
scripts.electron:preview: npm run build && tsc -p electron && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.preload.json && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('electron/appIcon.png', 'dist-electron/appIcon.png')" && electron .
